q: His jumper was deadly." Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the basketball seems like a rock, he said. " Reggie Jackson is the way it felt tonight. I stand by what I've said about those events, but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on, said Andy Coulson , who had worked for David Cameron for 31/2 years. Andy Coulson was "a brilliant member of my team and has thrown himself at the job with skill and dedication," David Cameron said.

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. "Just get your swagger back," Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what James May did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night
